articles.title: Southeastern and Govia Thameslink Railway winter timetables in force - BBC
articles.description: Southeastern is scrapping first class on its services between London, Kent and East Sussex.
articles.content:
Southeastern and Govia Thameslink have brought in new timetables in response to a large fall in commuting since the pandemic.
